reviews.text: I love the convenience of ordering online and picking up my meal at the drive-through. That is such a great convenience for this Clintonville...

I tried Hot Chicken Takeover for the first time this past weekend. I was told that this was the place to go for hot chicken in the 614.

The chicken was...
Everyone who works here is super nice. I am not a tenders girl but the white meat here hits different. Juicy and the flavor was next level. We fully inhaled...
